title: 210: Children's Lit - Live at Paideia!
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This episode was recorded live at the Paideia conference at Veritas Academy in 2022. In this episode, we roast a critic who hates fun things.
itunes:author: Fun, Funnest, and Funnerest
itunes:subtitle: Up with fun, down with critics
